author: A_Brickset_user
title: A great add to the Metroliner!
review:
Phong Hoang, you'll have to give it 9, because the panel that making the stripes go higher and lower have stud hollow plugs, originally they had solid stud plugs.
But in my word these changes don't do anything because you can't see them. So it's that I'll give it 10. But if I could see them, I'll give it a 9.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Got it...
review: I would have agreed with you, but you said it, you can't see the changes. BOX: 8/10 - When you buy it, the box will come in black and white. Not as good as good as the original club car box, though... PIECES: 10/10 - Great pieces and if this was 4547, the first set to use the double decker plate. PLAYABILITY: 10/10 - I really like the opening roof of the train. The sleeping compartments looks really good. It looks good alone, or with the Metroliner. OVERALL: 10/10 - The first double decker, and the greatest.
